feed.title: GitHub CSS Weekly Trending
feed.subtitle: Weekly Trending of CSS in GitHub

entry.title: hkhcoder/vprofile-project
entry.summary:
Prerequisites

  • JDK 17 or 21
  • Maven 3.9
  • MySQL 8

Technologies

  • Spring MVC
  • Spring Security
  • Spring Data JPA
  • Maven
  • JSP
  • Tomcat
  • MySQL
  • Memcached
  • Rabbitmq
  • ElasticSearch

Database

Here,we used Mysql DB sql dump file:

  • /src/main/resources/db_backup.sql
  • db_backup.sql file is a mysql dump file.we have to import this dump to mysql db server

  • mysql -u <user_name> -p accounts < db_backup.sql
